Body: Possible Duplicate:  Use usb as network access for android device?  How to set up reverse tethering over USB?Is there any option to use the internet connection from my PC running Ubuntu (12.04) with my phone (Samsung Galaxy Ace Android 2.3.7 with root)?I have tried many options to do it via wifi, but it still doesn't work (it is long story with my hardware and Galaxy Ace).
Title: Internet from Ubuntu to Android via USB

history.Text: I tryed many options to do it via wifi, but it still dosn't work (it is long story with my hardware and galaxy ace).Is there any option to use internet connection from my PC on ubuntu (12.04) at my phone (Samsung Galaxy Ace Android 2.3.7 with root)?
Internet from Ubuntu to andriod via USB
